knimeNode.name: GO GeneOntology
knimeNode.shortDescription: Download the gene inheriting a given GO identifier using the QuickGO API.

fullDescription.intro:
Call the QuickGO API to get the protein in the domain of a given GO ID.
This node is a wrapper around the QuickGO service for GeneOntology. It returns all the proteins that have been annotated by a GO term or by its descendant. The rows of this table, joined to a VCF pipeline are used to select the only SNPs linked to a GO term.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
